body_html:
Implementing lots of transformer models has further convinced me this is a really good idea. Often you see people writing out the dimensions names in a comment on top of the line they are working on.

However, the only way I can see this idea being competitive in speed is manipulating the AST (while respecting transposes).

body:
Implementing lots of transformer models has further convinced me this is a really good idea. Often you see people writing out the dimensions names in a comment on top of the line they are working on.

However, the only way I can see this idea being competitive in speed is manipulating the AST (while respecting transposes).
